system.description:
Demolitions: working with explosives to blow stuff up! This skill also covers defusing said explosives before they blow up!

Examples: throw Demolitions/INT 8+ to defuse a bomb of average complexity. Substitute DEX if the bomb is on a timer and is about to explode imminently. An Effect of -4 or worse will cause an accidental detonation. Throw Demolitions/EDU 10+ to demolish a bridge using the bare minimum of explosives. Throw Demolitions/INT 8+ to construct and plant homemade fragmentation mines on a defensive perimeter.
system.shortdescr: Working with explosives to blow stuff up
